content.value:
I made the mistake of telling Thom I wanted to exercise after work this year. Today I finished work and turned on the PS and he came running to tell me to do yoga.

I did it and now I feel great ☹️
content.html: I made the mistake of telling Thom I wanted to exercise after work this year. Today I finished work and turned on the PS and he came running to tell me to do yoga. I did it and now I feel great ☹️
